articles.title: Experimental heart failure drug does not improve exercise capacity in HFrEF patients - News-Medical.Net

articles.title: The Mortgage Rate in America Every Year Since 1972 - 24/7 Wall St.
articles.description: After four months of steady increase, the average rate for a 30-year fixed mortgage peaked at 4.91% on March 28, 2022 – the highest figure in over two years. The increase comes as the Federal Reserve began hiking interest rates, for the first time in three ye…
